subgrades.title: Phase 2
notes: Great mid- and low-level description. Try to extract a high-level description as well: "reads 6 integers and uses a loop to determine if they are a geometric sequence of the form..."

subgrades.title: Phase 2 high-level summary
notes: Captures the rough idea of the high-level computation, but
clarity or completeness could be improved.

subgrades.title: Phase 2 low-level operations
notes: Clearly identifies relevant operations in the low-level computation
that are key to the high-level computation.

subgrades.title: Phase 2 connection
notes: Clearly explains connection of low-level operations to high-level computation.

subgrades.title: Phase 5
notes: Good mid-to-level description. Try to extract a succint high-level description as well.

subgrades.title: Phase 5 high-level summary
notes: Touches on aspects of high-level computation, but does not

subgrades.title: Phase 5 low-level operations
notes: Clearly identifies relevant operations in the low-level computation
that are key to the high-level computation.

subgrades.title: Phase 5 connection
notes: Explains some connection of relevant low-level operations to high-level computation,
or clearly explains connection of moderately important low-level operations.
